title: New Client
body: IDK if other people have this problem or if it's normal, but I when I got ghe new client, the desktop icon stayed the same. When I click on the icon, it opens the Launch menu. When I get a new patch, it patches that Launch tab then the actual client patches. I've tried uninstalling and downloading again but I still have it this same way. Am I the only one?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client wants to update to the new version, but could be getting blocked.  To start off, go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add league as an exception.

 If the issue continues after completing those steps, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure your game files are in good condition to proceed with updates.  Let me know if you have any questions!
